title: How to connect to a broadband internet - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re wondering, “how do I connect my device to a broadband connection near me,” you should know that it is quite a simple process. Here are the steps: Go to the notification area of your laptop and click on the “Network” icon.Next, click on the wireless broadband connection to which you wish to connect.After that, enter the username and the password provided by the internet provider, and press connect.Next, select the preferred option from “Always connect automatically,” “Connect automatically except when roaming” and “Never connect automatically.” It’s preferable to select “Always connect automatically.”Click on “Continue” to finish the setup process.

You need to purchase the service from an ISP in your area who will install the device and the last mile connectivity between your premises and his network. Once the service is provided and tested you can connect to the router/device installed at your premises through WiFi or Ethernet cable.
